import React, { useState } from "react"; import logo from "../assets/logo.png"; import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; const RegisterForm = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, swtPassword] = useState(""); const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); console.log(email); const SignupSchema = Yup.object().shape({ firstName: Yup.string() .min(2, "Too Short!") .max(50, "Too Long!") .required("Required"), lastName: Yup.string() .min(2, "Too Short!") .max(50, "Too Long!") .required("Required"), email: Yup.string().email("Invalid email").required("Required"), }); return ( { alert("SUCCESS!! :-)\n\n" + JSON.stringify(fields, null, 4)); }} render={({ errors, status, touched }) => (
)} /> ); }; export default RegisterForm;
